name: Prop Game
description:
Prop Game is the perfect place to have fun with your friends!
Host a game and invite them to compete in crazy mini-games, solo or in teams!
You can play as a chair, a hat, a magnet, a staircase, a bottle and much more!
Who will be the best and win the most games? It's up to you!

You'll be controlling a random object with arcade-style physics, where even moving will be a challenge.
You can run into your friends to eject them, eliminate them to be the last survivor or to score points!

You'll be able to play as
- a chair
- a bottle
- a glass
- a hammer
- a magnet
- a saucepan
- a torch
- a staircase
- a hat
- a chalice



Various mini-games are available such as:
- TNT run
- Be the last to own the crown
- Obstacle course
- Team football
- Capture the flag



In each mini-game you can, or rather you can try to:
- Move forward
- Go backwards
- Go left
- Go right
- jump
